================
newsletter.types
================

Content types for newsletter creation from Volto site. Use it with volto-newsletter Volto addon.


Installation
------------

Install newsletter.types by adding it to your buildout::

    [buildout]

    ...

    eggs =
        newsletter.types


and then running ``bin/buildout``
